title: Fort Washington Park: Field Trips
body: Field Trips       Results   Showing results 1-1 of 1    Sort By:  Title Date         Fort Washington Park Visit Fort Washington!    History and nature come together at Fort Washington Park. Bring your class or school group to come explore our historic fortifications and over 300 acres of Potomac Riverfront.    Type:Field Trips Grade level:Pre-Kindergarten-General Subjects:Architecture, Architecture (Building Styles and Methods), Biology: Animals, Biology: Plants, Civil War, Earth Science, Engineering, Historic Preservation, History, Military and Wartime History, Recreation / Leisure / Tourism, Social Studies, War of 1812, Wildlife Biology, World War I, World War II
